DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare reliability validity new device standard method diagnose amniotic fluid leakage due premature rupture membrane ( PROM ) urine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Diagnostic Device Identifying Between Amniotic Fluid Urine
DOC.detailed_description: Pregnant woman sense wetness arrive delivery room suspect PROM use self-testing device test whether wetness cause amniotic fluid leakage urinary incontinence . Clinical evaluation perform pregnant woman use standard clinical test . The result standard clinical test compare woman 's read self-testing device result . Sensitivity specificity device evaluation calculate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant woman age 18 year old attend delivery room . 2 . Stage gestation : pregnancy 16 42 week gestation . 3 . Able willing read sign inform consent document . Subjects exclude study follow present : 1 . Prior use amniotic fluid detection test . 2 . Use vaginal douching apparatus ( vaginal bulb syringe ) vaginal product cream gel within past 24 hour . 3 . Vaginal bleed spot excess abnormal vaginal discharge within past 24 hour . 4 . Sexual intercourse within past 24 hour . 5 . Confirmed diagnosis vaginal infection within past 7 day . 6 . Use vaginal product antibiotic treatment reduce bacterial population use medication tamoxifen reduce estrogen level antihistamine dry mucous membrane within past 7 days.. 7 . Patients unable unwilling participate . 8 . Patients active labor ( regular contraction ) .
